attributes.action: Give Captain Tom Moore a Knighthood for services to his Country and the NHS.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Prime Minister to personally recommend Captain Tom Moore for a knighthood to HRH Queen Elizabeth II.
attributes.background: I would like the government to recommend Captain Tom Moore for a knighthood in return for his services to his country and the NHS. Tom has inspired the nation with his strength of character and resilience. He has raised our spirits and an extraordinary amount of money for our vital NHS.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
